description: This file is a part of the build system for GCC runtime libraries, primarily containing configuration, build, install, and testing instructions used by build tools such as BitBake. It defines compilation flags, configuration options, dependencies, package descriptions, and build steps for different target architectures and libraries associated with GCC runtime components.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures the build environment for GCC runtime libraries, creating dummy libraries and running configuration scripts for multiple target directories.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Compiles the configured GCC runtime components across multiple target directories.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled GCC runtime libraries and cleans up include and info files post-install.

methods.name: do_check
methods.description: Runs the test suite for GCC runtime libraries, setting up the environment to work around configuration issues, and handles cross-architecture testing.
